content:
<rule id="azure-aws-config-sqs-04004" xmlns="http://windup.jboss.org/schema/jboss-ruleset">
            <when>
                <filecontent filename="{*}.properties" pattern="aws.sqs"/>
            </when>
            <perform>
                <hint category-id="mandatory" effort="3" title="Amazon Simple Queue Service configuration">
                    <message>
                        The application contains Amazon Simple Queue Service configuration. Consider using Azure Service Bus instead.

                        * **Change configurations**: Update the Java application's configuration to replace the Amazon SQS settings with the equivalent Azure Service Bus configurations. 
                    </message>
                    <link href="https://learn.microsoft.com/azure/service-bus-messaging" title="Azure Service Bus documentation"/>
                    <link href="https://learn.microsoft.com/java/api/overview/azure/service-bus" title="Azure Service Bus libraries for Java"/>
                </hint>
            </perform>
        </rule>
